name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Burned] and loses 4% HP in each rounds, lasts 2 rounds
value: Karena efek {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} terkena [Blazed], kehilangan 4% HP setiap ronde, berlangsung 2 ronde.

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Stunned] and is unable to perform actions for 1 round
value: Karena efek {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} terkena [Stun], tidak dapat bergerak selama 1 ronde.

name: {MASTER_NAME} used {SKILL_NAME} on {TARGET_NAME}, caused {DAMAGE} DMG. {MASTER_NAME} restored {DAMAGE} HP.
value: {MASTER_NAME} menggunakan {SKILL_NAME} terhadap {TARGET_NAME}, menimbulkan {DAMAGE} DMG. {MASTER_NAME} memulihkan {DAMAGE} HP.

name: {MASTER_NAME} used {SKILL_NAME} and entered a [Taunt] state. All non-AoE skills only target self for 2 rounds.
value: {MASTER_NAME} menggunakan {SKILL_NAME}, mendapat status [Taunt]. Selama 2 ronde, Skill selain AoE hanya dapat menyerang diri sendiri.

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {MASTER_NAME} takes 65% less DMG for 2 rounds
value: Karena efek {SKILL_NAME}, DMG yang diterima {MASTER_NAME} berkurang 65% selama 2 ronde.

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Ignited] and receives {DAMAGE} DMG in each round, lasts 2 rounds
value: Karena efek {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} terkena [Burnt]. Setiap ronde menerima {DAMAGE} DMG, berlangsung 2 ronde.

name: {MASTER_NAME} used {SKILL_NAME} on {TARGET_NAME}, caused {DAMAGE} DMG, causes double DMG to target with [Ignite] effect
value: {MASTER_NAME} menggunakan {SKILL_NAME} terhadap {TARGET_NAME}, menimbulkan {DAMAGE} DMG. DMG dobel jika target terkena [Burnt].

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Weakened] and ATK is decreased by 50% for 2 rounds
value: Karena efek {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} terkena [Weak]. Selama 2 ronde, ATK berkurang 50%.

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Blinded] and ACC chance is decreased by 80% for 3 rounds
value: Karena efek {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} terkena [Blind]. Selama 3 ronde, ACC berkurang 80%.

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, in 3 rounds, {TARGET_NAME}'s DEF is increased by 60% and ATK is increased by 18%.
value: Karena efek {SKILL_NAME}, selama 3 ronde, DEF {TARGET_NAME} meningkat 60%, ATK meningkat 18%

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {MASTER_NAME} enters [Afterimage] state, increasing EVA Chance by 30% for 3 rounds.
value: Karena efek {SKILL_NAME}, {MASTER_NAME} terkena [Shadow]. Selama 3 ronde, EVA meningkat 30%.

name: {MASTER_NAME} used {SKILL_NAME} on {TARGET_NAME}, caused {DAMAGE} DMG, and restored 10% of the DMG dealt.
value: {MASTER_NAME} menggunakan {SKILL_NAME} terhadap {TARGET_NAME}, menimbulkan {DAMAGE} DMG, serta memulihkan HP sebesar 10% DMG yang diberikan.

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Sealed] and is unable to use any skills for 2 rounds.
value: Karena efek {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} terkena [Seal]. Selama 2 ronde, tidak dapat menggunakan Skill.

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} [Bleed] and cannot receive any healing for 1 round.
value: Karena efek {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} terkena [Bleed]. Selama 1 ronde, tidak dapat memulihkan HP.

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Stunned] and is unable to perform actions for 2 rounds
value: Karena efek {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} terkena Stun, tidak dapat bergerak, berlangsung 2 ronde.

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {MASTER_NAME} enters [Provoked] state, increasing DEF by 150%, ATK by 25%, lasts 3 rounds
value: Karena efek {SKILL_NAME}, {MASTER_NAME} mendapat [Steel], DEF meningkat 150%, ATK meningkat 25%, berlangsung 3 ronde.

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Pierced] and DEF is decreased by 60%, lasts 2 rounds
value: Karena efek {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} terkena [Pierced], DEF berkurang 60%, berlangsung 2 ronde.

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Poisoned] and loses 3% HP in each round, lasts 2 rounds
value: Karena efek {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} terkena [Poison], kehilangan 3% HP setiap ronde, berlangsung 2 ronde.

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Stunned] and is unable to perform actions for 1 round
value: Karena efek {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} terkena [Stun], tidak dapat bergerak selama 1 ronde.

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Frozen] and is unable to perform any actions, lasts 1 round.
value: Karena efek {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} terkena [Frozen], tidak dapat bergerak, berlangsung 1 ronde.

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Ignited] and loses {0}% HP in each round, lasts 2 rounds
value: Karena efek {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} terkena [Burnt], kehilangan 4% setiap ronde, berlangsung 2 ronde.

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Blinded] and ACC chance is decreased by 60% for 2 rounds
value: Karena efek {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} terkena [Blind]. Selama 2 ronde, ACC berkurang 60%.

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Poisoned] and loses 3% HP in  each round.
value: Karena efek {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} terkena [Poison], kehilangan 3% HP setiap ronde.

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {MASTER_NAME} enters [Bolstered] state. In 2 rounds, reduce DMG taken by 55% and increase DMG Reflection by 60%
value: Karena efek {SKILL_NAME}, {MASTER_NAME} menerima [Shield]. Selama 2 ronde, DMG yang diterima berkurang 55%, DMG Reflection meningkat 60%.

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, deals an extra {DAMAGE} True DMG to {TARGET_NAME}
value: Karena efek {SKILL_NAME}, memberikan tambahan {DAMAGE}True DMG terhadap {TARGET_NAME}.

name: Because of {SKILL_NAME}, {TARGET_NAME} is [Ignited] and loses {0}% of Lilith's ATK HP in each round, lasts 2 rounds
value: {TARGET_NAME} terkena [Burnt], setiap ronde menerima DMG sebesar 100% ATK {MASTER_NAME}, berlangsung 2 ronde.

value: Memberikan Hadiah pada Angel manapun 3 kali

name: Countless monsters poured from the mist, howling. We are surrounded by blood, fire, scream and prayer in despair... We must fight our way out!
value: Monster yang tak terhitung banyaknya berhamburan keluar dari bayangan kabut, melolong kencang. Kita dikepung oleh darah segar, api, jeritan, dan panjatan doa putus asa…. Kita harus bertarung untuk keluar dari sini!

name: The fate of a hero is to save a collapsing world. Use the flame of light to purify those who became slaves to the darkness!
value: Takdir seorang pahlawan adalah untuk menyelamatkan dunia yang tengah runtuh. Gunakanlah api cahaya untuk menyucikan mereka yang telah diperbudak kegelapan!

name: An obscure figure is lurking in the mist, following us like a beast following its prey. It's horrifying...
value: Bayangan tak dikenal melayang dari dalam kabut, mengikuti kita layaknya binatang buas yang mengincar mangsanya. Menakutkan sekali…

name: An obscure figure is lurking in the mist
value: Bayangan tak dikenal melayang dari dalam kabut

name: Some people are worse than monsters... In chaotic times, some people are blinded by greed and turn themselves into bandits, taking advantage of the crisis. They must be punished!
value: Manusia bisa menjadi lebih kejam daripada hewan…. Di saat kekacauan melanda, mereka dibutakan oleh keserakahan dan menjadi bandit. Mereka harus dihukum!

name: The monsters bared their teeth, with vile saliva coming out of their mouth. They've cornered a bunch of defenseless women and children. We must fight for those who can't!
value: Para monster memamerkan taring-taringnya dengan air liur menetes-netes, memojokkan para wanita dan anak-anak. Kita harus bertarung dan melindungi mereka!

name: The monsters surged in. Seoul is burning and the people in it is screaming and crying... Where is Angel's protection? Have we been abandoned by the Angel?
value: Monster merajalela, Seoul terbakar dan dipenuhi jerit tangis…. Ke mana para Angel? Apakah mereka telah melupakan kita?

name: The monsters are attacking the residence of Angel. The ward of protection is on the brink of destruction and the Angel is in imminent danger... No harm shall come to the Angel!
value: Para monster menyerang kediaman Angel. Mantra pelindungnya sudah hampir hancur, mereka dalam bahaya! Kita harus melindungi mereka!

name: An even bigger threat is here. The shadow in the mist finally revealed itself... We must defeat it!
value: Bahaya yang lebih besar telah muncul. Bayangan di dalam kabut akhirnya menunjukkan diri… Kita harus mengalahkannya!

name: Haunted by shadows and howling beasts, the land of the rising sun is plunged into a long night... Where is Angel Amaterasu?
value: Bayangan yang pekat, raungan yang bising. Negara ini telah jatuh dalam kegelapan… ke manakah Amaterasu?

name: When stepping into the abandoned shrine, a cry for help in the distance startled the raven on the eave. Who was calling for help? What happened?
value: Saat memasuki sebuah kuil yang terlantar, terdengar sebuah jeritan yang mengagetkan. Siapa itu yang minta tolong? Apa yang terjadi?

name: The monsters' sharp claws is going to hurt the Witch in the Shrine. How could we let her die here?
value: Monster itu akan menyakiti si penyihir! Bagaimana bisa kita biarkan begitu saja?

name: We don't know where the gloomy hallways leads to. To make matters worse, we got lost in the darkness...
value: Kita tidak tahu ke mana galeri ini membawa kita. Apalagi kita kini tersesat di dalam kegelapan ini….

name: The Dark Servants have joined the legion alongside bloodthirsty beasts. Only blood can purify their souls!
value: Para pelayan kegelapan telah bergabung menyerang, jiwa mereka hanya dapat dimurnikan oleh darah segar!

name: Climb the 8000 steps to the shrine of Tsukuyomi and rescue Angel Amaterasu!
value: Panjatlah 8000 tangga Tsukuyomi dan selamatkan Amaterasu!

name: The Shrine of Tsukuyomi has become a lair for the Darkspawns. It is shrouded in suffocating darkness. For the Angel and for the people suffering, we must go there.
value: Kuil Tsukuyomi telah menjadi sarang para monster, seluruh sudut diselimuti kegelapan. Kita harus ke sana, demi semua manusia dan Angel.

name: Back then, Tsukiyomi would stroll under the moonlight, dance before the flowers and countless weave sweet dreams for tired people in the quiet night. Now, everything has has changed...
value: Dahulu, Tsukiyomi suka berjalan-jalan di bawah sinar rembulan, menari di antara bunga-bunga, mengantar semua orang pergi ke alam mimpi yang indah. Kini semuanya telah berubah…

name: The once majestic temple is left with a few broken walls. The ruined statue seems to be telling passersby about the past glories. But now, the ruins are filled with Darkspawns.
value: Kuil yang dahulu megah kini tinggal puing-puing tembok yang rusak. Tapi kini, reruntuhan ini penuh dengan monster kegelapan.

name: The darkness has engulfed everything. There is a dim light at the end of the crisis-ridden hallway which we have to go through.
value: Kegelapan telah menyelimuti segalanya. Ada cahaya redup di ujung jalan gelap ini, kita harus menuju ke sana.

name: The ghosts are staring at us with their crimson eyes, roaring. One mistake and they could take our souls. Please be careful.
value: Hantu-hantu itu memelototi kita dengan matanya yang merah menyala. Satu saja kesalahan, nyawa kita bisa melayang, berhati-hatilah.

name: The light at the end of the hallway never goes out, just as the light has never been consumed by the darkness. Soldier on, warriors!
value: Cahaya di ujung jalan gelap ini tidak akan pernah padam diselimuti kegelapan. Majulah, para pejuang yang berani!

name: The serpent coils itself above the temple gate, poking its crimson tongue about. What is waiting for us behind this gate?
value: Ular berbisa itu menjulurkan lidahnya dari atas gerbang kuil, entah apa yang menunggu kita di balik ini?

name: The corpses of gods scattered across the temple. Hades died in agony with his mouth open. Poseidon died holding his broken trident. Athena and Apollo were no exception... The death of gods has shocked the world.
value: Mayat para dewa tersebar di seluruh kuil. Hades meninggal tragis dengan mulut terbuka. Poseidon meninggal dengan masih menggenggam garpunya yang patah. Athena… juga Apollo…. Kematian para dewa mengagetkan dunia.

name: The Box! Pandora has opened the Box of Devil... We must stop her!
value: Pandora telah membuka kotaknya…. Kita harus menghentikannya!

name: We must return the light to the mortal world, even if the gods are in our way!
value: Kita harus mengembalikan cahaya ke dunia ini, bahkan jika para dewa menghalangi jalan kita!

name: The vast plain is desolate and uninhabited. Wailing wind, dim sunlight, and the occasional stray beasts are the only things here. On cloudy days, one can often hear ghosts cry.
value: Dataran yang luas ini tak berpenghuni dan terlantar, yang ada hanya angin melolong, sinar matahari redup, dan monster-monster liar. Di hari yang mendung, tangisan hantu sering terdengar.

name: Strangely, it began to snow, and the scorched desert became as cold as the land of the ghosts...
value: Dari langit mulai turun salju. Padang gurun yang dulu panas membara kini tiba-tiba berubah sedingin dunia hantu…

name: The Grand Pyramid sits on the edge of the Dune Sea, whispering the words about the past. -This is the Tomb of Gods.
value: Piramida emas berdiri di pinggir lautan pasir, berbisik cerita tentang masa lalu. Di sini adalah makam para dewa.

name: The gate to the main chamber requires an offering to open. The offering is the life of Darkspawn!
value: Gerbang ke ruang utama memerlukan kurban baru dapat terbuka, yaitu kurban para spawn kegelapan!

name: Death shall befall those who disturb our rest! -The curse written on the tomb gate
value: Kematian akan menghantui mereka yang mengganggu tidur orang yang telah tiada'——Sebuah kutukan terukir di gerbang makam

name: Screaming souls erupted from the tomb gate when it is opened. They are the last guardians and they are trying to grab our throats!
value: Jiwa yang menjerit muncul keluar saat pintu makan dibuka. Mereka adalah sang penjaga makam terakhir, dan mereka berusaha membunuh kita!

name: Hall of Stories-A place of sacrifice that records the life of the tomb owner. What kind of story will unfold here today?
value: Aula Cerita——sebuah tempat pengurbanan yang mencatat sejarah tentang pemilik makam. Entah cerita apa yang akan tersibak di sini?

name: Lies and betrayal have stripped down the Fallen God's disguise. The sun will eventually rise and we shall light the fire of dawn.
value: Kebohongan dan pengkhianatan telah melucuti samaran para Dewa yang jatuh. Matahari pasti akan terbit dan kita akan menyalakan api penerangan.

name: I shall summon my fallen comrades and form an army to take down the enemy!
value: Kawan-kawanku yang telah gugur, bangkitlah dan kalahkan musuh!

name: This forest is alive. It calls you and seduces you. When you enter the forest, it will devour you!
value: Hutan ini hidup. Mereka memanggil dan merayumu. Begitu kamu masuk, mereka akan menyantapmu!

name: The tons of bones are like a field of snow, the will-o'-the-wisp is like the dancing ghosts and the howling wind is like ghost crying
value: Tumpukan tulang belulang putih menggunung seperti salju, arwah-arwah melayang seperti hantu yang menari, dan angin yang melolong terdengar seperti tangisan hantu.

name: Everyone admires the beauty of Medusa but no one dares to look Medusa in her eyes and no one has ever walked out of this hill alive.
value: Semua orang mengagumi kecantikan Medusa, tapi tak ada seorang pun yang berani menatap matanya, dan tak ada satu orang pun yang dapat keluar dari sini hidup-hidup.

name: The mist has always covered this marsh. The song of Muse could get you out of here, but it could also make you drown.
value: Kabut selalu menyelimuti rawa ini. Hanya lagu Muse yang dapat memandumu keluar atau malah tenggelam ke dasar.

name: Read the next life written on the Stone of Life, count the regrets on Naihe Bridge and cross the bridge to reach the other side.
value: Hidup selanjutnya tertulis di batu, Jembatan Nether penuh dengan penyesalan. Dengan melewati jembatan ini, baru dapat menyeberang ke kehidupan selanjutnya.

name: The Darklords are hiding in the Blood Castle within the Crimson Tides. Find them and kill them.
value: Sang penguasa kegelapan bersembunyi di kastil darah di dalam gelombang merah membara. Temukan dan bunuh mereka.

name: Take pride in being a human. Even if you are up against a God!
value: Jangan pernah melupakan kebanggaan hidup sebagai manusia, biarpun kamu sedang berhadapan dengan Dewa!

name: The Bifrost that connects Asgard and the world has been destroyed by the Darkspawns...
value: Jembatan Pelangi yang menghubungkan Asgard dan dunia, kini telah dihancurkan oleh para spawn kegelapan….

name: This palace is made out of gold. It was once the residence of Godking Odin. Countless warriors have feasted here... Do net let the darkness corrupt this place!
value: Tempat tinggal sang raja dewa, Odin. Istana yang terbuat dari emas, banyak ksatria yang telah menikmati jamuan di sini…. Jangan biarkan kegelapan mencemari tempat ini!

name: He who wield this spear shall rule the world. -Inscription on the Spear of Eternity
value: Pemegang tombak ini akan menjadi penguasa dunia'——Inskripsi Spear of Eternity

name: The Valkyrie once rode a white horse across the battlefield, seeking the martyrs and bless them with a kiss. But she is now blinded by darkness...
value: Sang ksatria dahulu menunggang kuda putih dalam pertempuran, mencari martir untuk memberkatinya dengan ciuman. Tapi kini ia dibutakan oleh kegelapan….

name: Legend has it that the soul of a true hero will reach Odin's Valhalla when he dies. He shall fight in the day and feast in the night. But now...
value: Menurut legenda, jiwa seorang pahlawan akan menuju Valhalla Odin setelah meninggal. Di siang hari ia akan bertempur, dan malam hari menyantap jamuan. Tapi kini….

name: The world tree that supports the nine realms collapsed and the fire of despair has torn Asgard apart. People are praying. Go help them!
value: Pohon Dunia yang menjaga sembilan realm runtuh, dan api keputusasaan membakar Asgard. Semua orang tengah berdoa… Pergilah, selamatkan mereka!

name: The ground is shaking and the ocean is boiling. The demons are riding on giant ships made of dead men's nails! This is the final hour! For the End of Eternity!
value: Tanah bergetar, laut membara. Sang iblis menaiki kapal raksasa yang terbuat dari kuku orang mati! Waktu bertempur telah tiba! Demi akhir keabadian!

name: Resistance is futile before absolute darkness and power...
value: Di hadapan kegelapan dan kekuatan absolut, segala perlawanan tak ada gunanya….

name: Legend has it that billions of years ago, the sky was torn apart and creatures on earth were devastated. Nuwa patched up the sky with a stone and save the people. But now, the Darkspawns are trying to harm Nuwa!
value: Berjuta tahun yang lalu, langit terbelah dan makhluk bumi hampir terbasmi. Saat itu, Nuwa memperbaiki langit menggunakan batu dan menyelamatkan manusia. Tapi kini, para spawn kegelapan ingin mencelakai Nuwa!

name: The entrance to 33 planes of existence. An immortal once rode a crane through here. A powerful man once cut into the mountain here. But Darkspawns have occupied this place now...
value: Pintu masuk menuju 33 surga eksistansi. Seorang dewa pernah menunggang bangau melewati tempat ini. Seorang pria pernah membelah gunung di sini. Tapi kini, spawn kegelapan menguasai tempat ini….

name: This place was once a land of marvel, but is now a monster-infested deadly mountain pass...
value: Tempat ini dahulu adalah tempat ajaib yang megah, tapi kini sudah dikuasai oleh monster…

name: Shennong has tasted a hundred different herbs and taught people about farming and herbal medicine. Banish the monsters!
value: Shennong telah mencicipi ratusan macam tanaman obat yang berbeda, dan mengajari orang-orang tentang pertanian dan obat-obatan. Usirlah para monster!

name: Ying and Yang, Four Symbols and Eight Diagrams creates millions of artifacts! Back off, evils!
value: Yinyang, empat figur, dan delapan trigram menciptakan ribuan artefak! Enyahlah, iblis!

name: This is the world of fire. The fire of red lotus will incinerate everything!
value: Ini adalah dunia api, kobaran lotus merah akan menghabisi segalanya!

name: The Heaven Lake on Mt. Kunlun has given birth to snow apes, blue birds, swan geese, Bai Ze and countless life forms... Let the light shine over this place again!
value: Danau Surga di Gunung Kunlun telah melahirkan gorila salju, burung biru, angsa elok, Bai Ze, dan macam-macam makhluk hidup…. Mari kita cerahkan kembali tempat ini!

name: The Kingdom of God above the Temple of Heaven, please grant me the power of the gods to kill the demons!
value: Kerajaan Dewa di atas Kuil Surga, berkatilah aku dengan kekuatan untuk membunuh para iblis!

name: Who could've thought that this place was once a land of prosperity... The Demonlord hid herself here. Find her!
value: Siapa yang sangka tempat ini dahulu adalah daerah yang makmur… Sang pemimpin iblis bersembunyi di sini. Temukan dia!

name: The demon blood has corrupted this land
value: Darah iblis telah mengkorupsi tempat ini

name: The fallen angels have abandoned their beliefs and responsibilities!
value: Angel yang kalah telah melupakan kepercayaan dan tanggung jawab mereka!

name: The demon blood has corrupted this land and the fallen angels have abandoned their beliefs and responsibilities!
value: Darah iblis telah mengkorupsi tempat ini dan Angel yang kalah telah melupakan kepercayaan dan tanggung jawab mereka!

name: I can still remember this creek, sheperd boy are resting here with his flock of sheep, farm woman is washing her clothes while singing and the mill uptream is grinding nonstop... Darkness has destroyed it all!
value: Aku masih ingat sungai kecil ini, seorang anak gembala beristirahat di sini dengan ternaknya. Seorang wanita mencuci baju di sungai sambil bernyanyi, dan kincir air terus berputar tanpa henti…. Kini kegelapan telah menghancurkan segalanya!

name: The fallen angel dances naked on a floor of feather. Her crimson lips are as inviting as a glass of wine... Don't kiss her!
value: Angel yang gugur menari di lantai penuh bulu lembut. Bibirnya yang merah seperti anggur sungguh menggoda…. Jangan menciumnya!

name: What's the difference between angels and demons? What's the difference between good and evil? Have you ever doubted your beliefs and resolution?
value: Apa perbedaan antara malaikat dan iblis? Apa perbedaan antara kebaikan dan kejahatan? Apakah kau pernah meragukan kepercayaan dan resolusimu?

name: Nothing is true, everything is permitted. Eternal life is only granted to those who follow my cause! -Unholy Bible Volume XI
value: Tak ada yang abadi, tak ada yang terlarang. Kehidupan absolut hanya akan diberikan pada dia yang mengikuti kata-kataku——Kitab Kematian Volume XI

name: Angels love to make judgments. It doesn't matter if the angel has fallen or not. Perhaps they are using judgments to strengthen their teetering faith.
value: Malaikat suka menghakimi, entah itu malaikat gugur atau bukan. Mungkin mereka menggunakan penghakiman untuk memperkuat lagi kepercayaan mereka yang mulai goyah.

name: Some are willing to feed themselves to the tiger, some are willing to cut their flesh off to feed the eagle, some are willing to sacrifice themselves for the greater good and some are willing to travel deep into the abyss without hesitation!
value: Ada yang sudi mengumpankan diri ke harimau, ada yang sudi memotong dagingnya sendiri untuk memberi makan elang. Ada yang sudi mengorbankan diri sendiri demi kebaikan yang lebih besar, bahkan ada yang sudi berjalan masuk dalam kegelapan pekat tanpa ragu!

name: The Sea of Darkness, the Toxic Swamp, the Desolate Land and the Burning Ridge... This is not going to be an ordinary journey...
value: Lautan kegelapan, Rawa Beracun, Dataran Terlantar, dan Pegunungan Membara…. Ini akan menjadi perjalanan yang luar biasa….

name: The four-hundred-eighty temples of the Southern Dynasty in the mist and rain their many towers can be seen
value: 480 kuil berdiri di tengah kabut dan hujan di Dinasti Nan.

name: The once majestic temple is left with a few broken walls. The ruined statue seems to be telling passersby about the past glories.
value: Kuil yang dahulu megah kini tinggal puing-puing tembok yang rusak.

name: But now, the ruins are filled with Darkspawns.
value: Tapi kini, reruntuhan ini penuh dengan monster kegelapan.

name: There is a dim light at the end of the crisis-ridden hallway which we have to go through.
value: Ada cahaya redup di ujung jalan gelap ini, kita harus menuju ke sana

name: The ghosts are staring at us with their crimson eyes, roaring.
value: Hantu-hantu itu memelototi kita dengan matanya yang merah menyala…

name: One mistake and they could take our souls. Please be careful.
value: Satu saja kesalahan, nyawa kita bisa melayang, berhati-hatilah.

name: The light at the end of the hallway never goes out, just as the light has never been consumed by the darkness.
value: Cahaya di ujung jalan gelap ini tidak akan pernah padam diselimuti kegelapan.

name: The serpent coils itself above the temple gate, poking its crimson tongue about.
value: Ular berbisa itu menjulurkan lidahnya dari atas gerbang kuil.

name: What is waiting for us behind this gate?
value: Entah apa yang menunggu kita di balik ini?

name: The corpses of gods scattered across the temple. Hades died in agony with his mouth open. Poseidon died holding his broken trident. Athena and Apollo were no exception... the world.
value: Mayat para dewa tersebar di seluruh kuil. Hades meninggal tragis dengan mulut terbuka. Poseidon meninggal dengan masih menggenggam garpunya yang patah. Athena… juga Apollo…

name: The death of gods has shocked
The Box! Pandora has opened the Box of Devil... We must stop her!
value: Pandora telah membuka kotaknya…. Kita harus menghentikannya!

name: We must return the light to the mortal world.
value: Kita harus mengembalikan cahaya ke dunia ini!

name: Even if the gods are in our way!
value: Bahkan jika para dewa menghalangi jalan kita!

name: The vast plain is desolate and uninhabited.
value: Dataran yang luas ini tak berpenghuni dan terlantar.

name: Wailing wind, dim sunlight, and the occasional stray beasts are the only things here. On cloudy days, one can often hear ghosts cry.
value: Yang ada hanya angin melolong, sinar matahari redup, dan monster-monster liar. Di hari yang mendung, tangisan hantu sering terdengar.

name: The scorched desert became as cold as the land of the ghosts!
value: Padang gurun yang dulu panas membara kini tiba-tiba berubah sedingin dunia hantu

name: The Grand Pyramid sits on the edge of the Dune Sea, whispering the words about the past.
value: Piramida emas berdiri di pinggir lautan pasir, berbisik cerita tentang masa lalu

name: This is the Tomb of Gods.
value: —— Di sini adalah makam para dewa.

name: The gate to the main chamber requires an offering to open.
value: Gerbang ke ruang utama memerlukan kurban baru dapat terbuka

name: The offering is the life of Darkspawn!
Death shall befall those who disturb our rest!
value: Kematian akan menghantui mereka yang mengganggu tidur orang yang telah tiada'

name: The curse written on the tomb gate.
Screaming souls erupted from the tomb gate when it is opened.
value: Jiwa yang menjerit muncul keluar saat pintu makan dibuka.

name: They are the last guardians and they are trying to grab our throats!
value: Mereka adalah sang penjaga makam terakhir, dan mereka berusaha membunuh kita!

name: Hall of Stories-A place of sacrifice that records the life of the tomb owner.
value: Aula Cerita——sebuah tempat pengurbanan yang mencatat sejarah tentang pemilik makam

name: What kind of story will unfold here today?
value: Entah cerita apa yang akan tersibak di sini?

name: Lies and betrayal have stripped down the Fallen God's disguise.
value: Kebohongan dan pengkhianatan telah melucuti samaran para Dewa yang jatuh.

name: The sun will eventually rise and we shall light the fire of dawn.
value: Matahari pasti akan terbit dan kita akan menyalakan api penerangan.

name: Form your army to take down the enemy!
This forest is alive. It calls you and seduces you.
value: Hutan ini hidup. Mereka memanggil dan merayumu.

name: When you enter the forest, it will devour you!
value: Begitu kamu masuk, mereka akan menyantapmu!

name: The tons of bones are like a field of snow, the will-o'-the-wisp is like the dancing ghosts.
value: Tumpukan tulang belulang putih menggunung seperti salju, arwah-arwah melayang seperti hantu yang menari

name: The howling wind is like ghost crying.
value: Dan angin yang melolong terdengar seperti tangisan hantu.

name: Everyone admires the beauty of Medusa.
value: Semua orang mengagumi kecantikan Medusa, tapi tak ada seorang pun yang berani menatap matanya

name: But no one dares to look Medusa in her eyes and no one has ever walked out of this hill alive.
value: Tak ada satu orang pun yang dapat keluar dari sini hidup-hidup.

name: The mist has always covered this marsh.
The song of Muse could get you out of here, but it could also make you drown.
value: Hanya lagu Muse yang dapat memandumu keluar atau malah tenggelam ke dasar.

name: Read the next life written on the Stone of Life.
value: Hidup selanjutnya tertulis di batu, Jembatan Nether penuh dengan penyesalan

name: Count the regrets on Naihe Bridge and cross the bridge to reach the other side
value: Dengan melewati jembatan ini, baru dapat menyeberang ke kehidupan selanjutnya.

name: The Darklords are hiding in the Blood Castle within the Crimson Tides.
value: Sang penguasa kegelapan bersembunyi di kastil darah di dalam gelombang merah membara

name: Take pride in being a human.
value: Jangan pernah melupakan kebanggaan hidup sebagai manusia

name: Even if you are up against the God!
value: Biarpun kamu sedang berhadapan dengan Dewa!

name: The Bifrost that connects Asgard and the world...
value: Jembatan Pelangi yang menghubungkan Asgard dan dunia

name: But now, the Bifrost has been destroyed by the Darkspawns!
value: Kini telah dihancurkan oleh para spawn kegelapan….

name: This palace is made out of gold. It was once the residence of Godking Odin. Countless warriors have feasted here...
value: Tempat tinggal sang raja dewa, Odin. Istana yang terbuat dari emas, banyak ksatria yang telah menikmati jamuan di sini….

name: Do not let the darkness corrupt this place!
value: Jangan biarkan kegelapan mencemari tempat ini!

name: He who wield this spear shall rule the world.
value: Pemegang tombak ini akan menjadi penguasa dunia'

name: The Valkyrie once rode a white horse across the battlefield, seeking the martyrs and bless them with a kiss.
value: Sang ksatria dahulu menunggang kuda putih dalam pertempuran, mencari martir untuk memberkatinya dengan ciuman

name: But she is now blinded by darkness...
value: Tapi kini ia dibutakan oleh kegelapan….

name: Legend has it that the soul of a true hero will reach Odin's Valhalla when he dies.
value: Menurut legenda, jiwa seorang pahlawan akan menuju Valhalla Odin setelah meninggal

name: He shall fight in the day and feast in the night. But now...
value: Di siang hari ia akan bertempur, dan malam hari menyantap jamuan. Tapi kini….

name: The world tree that supports the nine realms collapsed and the fire of despair has torn Asgard apart.
value: Pohon Dunia yang menjaga sembilan realm runtuh, dan api keputusasaan membakar Asgard

name: People are praying. Go help them!
value: Semua orang tengah berdoa… Pergilah, selamatkan mereka!

name: The ground is shaking and the ocean is boiling. The demons are riding on giant ships made of dead men's nails!
value: Tanah bergetar, laut membara. Sang iblis menaiki kapal raksasa yang terbuat dari kuku orang mati!

name: This is the final moment! For the End of Eternity!
value: Waktu bertempur telah tiba! Demi akhir keabadian!

name: Facing the absolute darkness and power...
value: Di hadapan kegelapan dan kekuatan absolut

name: Legend has it that billions of years ago, the sky was torn apart and creatures on earth were devastated. Nuwa patched up the sky with a stone and save the people!
value: Berjuta tahun yang lalu, langit terbelah dan makhluk bumi hampir terbasmi. Saat itu, Nuwa memperbaiki langit menggunakan batu dan menyelamatkan manusia.

name: But now, Numa is under attack!
value: Tapi kini, para spawn kegelapan ingin mencelakai Nuwa!

name: The entrance to 33 planes of existence. An immortal once rode a crane through here. A powerful man once cut into the mountain here.
value: Pintu masuk menuju 33 surga eksistansi. Seorang dewa pernah menunggang bangau melewati tempat ini. Seorang pria pernah membelah gunung di sini.

name: But Darkspawns have occupied this place now...
value: Tapi kini, spawn kegelapan menguasai tempat ini….

name: This place was once a land of marvel,
value: Tempat ini dahulu adalah tempat ajaib yang megah

name: But now, a monster-infested deadly mountain pass...
value: Tapi kini sudah dikuasai oleh monster…

name: Shennong has tasted a hundred different herbs and taught people about farming and herbal medicine.
value: Shennong telah mencicipi ratusan macam tanaman obat yang berbeda, dan mengajari orang-orang tentang pertanian dan obat-obatan.

value: Yinyang, empat figur, dan delapan trigram menciptakan ribuan artefak!

The fire of red lotus will incinerate everything!
value: Kobaran lotus merah akan menghabisi segalanya!

value: Danau Surga di Gunung Kunlun telah melahirkan gorila salju, burung biru, angsa elok, Bai Ze, dan macam-macam makhluk hidup….

name: Let the light shine over this place again!
value: Mari kita cerahkan kembali tempat ini!

name: The Kingdom of God above the Temple of Heaven!
value: Kerajaan Dewa di atas Kuil Surga

name: Please grant me the power of the gods to kill the demons
value: Berkatilah aku dengan kekuatan untuk membunuh para iblis!

name: Who could've thought that this place was once a land of prosperity...
value: Siapa yang sangka tempat ini dahulu adalah daerah yang makmur…

name: The Demonlord hid herself here. Find her!
value: Sang pemimpin iblis bersembunyi di sini. Temukan dia!

name: I can still remember this creek, sheperd boy are resting here with his flock of sheep, farm woman is washing her clothes while singing and the mill uptream is grinding nonstop...  it all!
value: Aku masih ingat sungai kecil ini, seorang anak gembala beristirahat di sini dengan ternaknya. Seorang wanita mencuci baju di sungai sambil bernyanyi, dan kincir air terus berputar tanpa henti….

name: But it has been destroyed by darkness!
The fallen angel dances naked on a floor of feather.
value: Angel yang gugur menari di lantai penuh bulu lembut

name: Her crimson lips are as inviting as a glass of wine... Don't kiss her!
value: Bibirnya yang merah seperti anggur sungguh menggoda…. Jangan menciumnya!

name: What's the difference between angels and demons? What's the difference between good and evil?
value: Apa perbedaan antara malaikat dan iblis? Apa perbedaan antara kebaikan dan kejahatan?

name: Have you ever doubted your beliefs and resolution?
value: Apakah kau pernah meragukan kepercayaan dan resolusimu?

name: Nothing is true, everything is permitted. Eternal life is only granted to those who follow my cause!
value: Tak ada yang abadi, tak ada yang terlarang. Kehidupan absolut hanya akan diberikan pada dia yang mengikuti kata-kataku

name: Angels love to make judgments. It doesn't matter if the angel has fallen or not.
value: Malaikat suka menghakimi, entah itu malaikat gugur atau bukan

name: Perhaps they are using judgments to strengthen their teetering faith.
value: Mungkin mereka menggunakan penghakiman untuk memperkuat lagi kepercayaan mereka yang mulai goyah.

name: Some are willing to feed themselves to the tiger, some are willing to cut their flesh off to feed the eagle, some are willing to sacrifice themselves for the greater good。
value: Ada yang sudi mengumpankan diri ke harimau, ada yang sudi memotong dagingnya sendiri untuk memberi makan elang. Ada yang sudi mengorbankan diri sendiri demi kebaikan yang lebih besar.

name: Travel deep into the abyss without hesitation, they are real warriors!
value: Bahkan ada yang sudi berjalan masuk dalam kegelapan pekat tanpa ragu!

name: The Sea of Darkness, the Toxic Swamp, the Desolate Land and the Burning Ridge...
value: Lautan kegelapan, Rawa Beracun, Dataran Terlantar, dan Pegunungan Membara….

name: This is not going to be an ordinary journey...
value: Ini akan menjadi perjalanan yang luar biasa….

name: The fate of a hero is to save a collapsing world.
value: Takdir seorang pahlawan adalah untuk menyelamatkan dunia yang tengah runtuh.

name: Use the flame of light to purify those who became slaves to the darkness!
value: Gunakanlah api cahaya untuk menyucikan mereka yang telah diperbudak kegelapan!

name: An obscure figure is lurking in the mist, following us like a beast following its prey. It's horrifying...
value: Bayangan tak dikenal melayang dari dalam kabut, mengikuti kita layaknya binatang buas yang mengincar mangsanya. Menakutkan sekali…

name: Some people are worse than monsters... In chaotic times, some people are blinded by greed and turn themselves into bandits, taking advantage of the crisis. They must be punished!
value: Manusia bisa menjadi lebih kejam daripada hewan…. Di saat kekacauan melanda, mereka dibutakan oleh keserakahan dan menjadi bandit. Mereka harus dihukum!

name: The monsters bared their teeth, with vile saliva coming out of their mouth. They've cornered a bunch of defenseless women and children.
value: Para monster memamerkan taring-taringnya dengan air liur menetes-netes, memojokkan para wanita dan anak-anak

name: We must fight for them!
value: Kita harus bertarung dan melindungi mereka!

name: The monsters surged in. Seoul is burning and the people in it is screaming and crying...
value: Monster merajalela, Seoul terbakar dan dipenuhi jerit tangis….

name: Where is Angel's protection? Have we been abandoned by the Angel?
value: Ke mana para Angel? Apakah mereka telah melupakan kita?

name: The monsters are attacking the residence of Angel. The ward of protection is on the brink of destruction and the Angel is in imminent danger...
value: Para monster menyerang kediaman Angel. Mantra pelindungnya sudah hampir hancur, mereka dalam bahaya!

name: No harm shall come to the Angel!
An even bigger threat is here. The shadow in the mist finally revealed itself...
value: Bahaya yang lebih besar telah muncul. Bayangan di dalam kabut akhirnya menunjukkan diri…

name: A gargantuan barrier stands in the way...
value: Halangan besar sekali menghadang di depan

name: May the prophet light our paths？
There is still a glimmer of hope…
The first light lingers on...
value: Cahaya itu masih belum sepenuhnya ditelan

name: Ugh... I can’t... walk anymore...
value: Ugh… benar-benar… tidak bisa bergerak lagi….

name: Is this the hope I’ve been looking for?
Good luck will be with you!
We can’t hold much longer here!
value: Kami tidak bisa bertahan lebih lama lagi

name: No monsters can get through here!
Move out. Let’s fight for a better future!
value: Majulah, berperang demi masa depan lebih baik!

name: We must protect the world we love!
value: Kita harus melindungi dunia yang hangat ini

name: The heroes’ souls are beckoning me！
The banner of freedom and light！
Human foibles breed monsters...
value: Kejahatan karakter manusia menelurkan para monster

name: Man’s nature at birth is evil...
Monsters won’t disappear unless humanity is wiped out
value: Monster tidak akan hilang jika manusia tidak dimusnahkan

name: The great hero Romulus watches over Rome.
This is the power of heroes!
Men and women—everyone is just an ordinary person…
value: Setiap manusia itu hanyalah orang biasa

name: Astral Deity of the Maned Head
value: Astral Deity of the Maned Head
